name: Step Journey
description:
Unusual turn-based RPG, combining Hack and Slash
With each level, monsters become more difficult and unusual, new weapons and armor appear.
Locations are created using procedural generation

PROCEDURAL MAP GENERATION

Each map is unique and consists of different pieces united by design and location features.

MONSTERS, Beasts, UNDEAD, ETC.

Each type of location has its own unique monsters. Each of them has its own unusual characteristics and attack style.
From slow and strong zombies, skeleton archers, to demons and magical elementals.

WEAPONS AND MAGIC FOR EVERY TASTE

  • Swords;
  • Luke;
  • Axes;
  • Crossbows;
  • Magic Staves;
  • Armor Sets.
You will be able to assemble your UNIQUE warrior with unusual characteristics and abilities.

TRADE

In the cities there are merchants with a unique and constantly updated range of goods.
